wikipedia_page.main: Donald MacPherson  (1922 - 2012) was a Scottish bagpipe player, and one of the most successful competitive solo pipers of all time.

response: Donald McPherson or Donald Macpherson may refer to:
*Donald Macpherson (British Army officer), army officer who fought in the American Revolution
*Donald Macpherson Baillie, Scottish theologian, ecumenist, and parish minister
*Donald Macpherson BEM was a Scottish bagpipe player, and one of the most successful competitive solo pipers of all time
